select count(1) as count from sys_user where 1 = 1
and name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
and pass like concat('%',#{pass},'%')

select u.id,u.name,u.pass,u.birthday,d.dept_id,d.dept_name from sys_user u left join sys_dept d on u.dept_id = d.dept_id where 1 = 1
and name like concat('%',#{user.name},'%')
and pass like concat('%',#{user.pass},'%')
order by u.id limit #{offset},#{pageSize}
select * from sys_user where name = #{name} and pass = #{pass}
SELECT (COUNT(CASE WHEN student_gender = '女' THEN 1 END) / COUNT(*)) * 100 AS male_percentage FROM sys_student;
SELECT (COUNT(CASE WHEN student_gender = '男' THEN 1 END) / COUNT(*)) * 100 AS male_percentage FROM sys_student;
SELECT sm.major_name as name , COUNT(*) AS value FROM sys_student stu inner join sys_major sm on sm.major_id = stu.major_id GROUP BY stu.major_id,sm.major_name ORDER BY value DESC;

SELECT sm.major_name as name , COUNT(*) AS student_count, (COUNT(*) / (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sys_student)) * 100 AS value FROM sys_student stu inner join sys_major sm on sm.major_id = stu.major_id GROUP BY stu.major_id,sm.major_name ORDER BY student_count DESC;
SELECT sm.grade_name as name , COUNT(*) AS value FROM sys_student stu inner join sys_grade sm on sm.grade_id = stu.grade_id GROUP BY stu.grade_id ,sm.grade_name ORDER BY value DESC;
SELECT sm.banji_name as name , COUNT(*) AS value FROM sys_student stu inner join sys_banji sm on sm.banji_id = stu.banji_id GROUP BY stu.banji_id ,sm.banji_name ORDER BY value desc limit 6;

SELECT sm.major_name AS name, COUNT(*) AS student_count, COUNT(CASE WHEN stu.student_gender = '男' THEN 1 END) AS boy_count, COUNT(CASE WHEN stu.student_gender = '女' THEN 1 END) AS girl_count FROM sys_student stu INNER JOIN sys_major sm ON sm.major_id = stu.major_id GROUP BY stu.major_id, sm.major_name ORDER BY student_count DESC;
